alert.note: Alert for Bartow (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 6:11PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Bartow County through 645 PM EDT... At 611 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Euharlee, or 7 miles west of Cartersville. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Cartersville, Euharlee, Kingston and Cassville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
